snippet: Rafael Nadal went down fighting on his favourite battleground a year ago but this time his quest for an unprecedented 10th French Open title ended sitting glumly in front of a microphone....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal went down fighting on his favourite battleground a year ago but this time his quest for an unprecedented 10th French Open title ended sitting glumly in front of a microphone.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Pull-Out Stuns French Open but Show Goes On
headline.main: Nadal Pull-Out Stuns French Open but Show Goes On
